AI Description: Torchinfo is a PyTorch library that provides detailed layer-by-layer model information, such as shapes, number of parameters, and memory usage. It helps in debugging neural network architectures and understanding the flow of data through the network.
Core Features:
1. Layer-by-layer model information
2. Insights into shapes, parameters, and memory usage
3. Debugging neural network architectures
4. Understanding data flow in the network
General Tags: Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Pytorch, Model Debugging
